definition: king or monarch/best or strongest of its type/grand/great
lit. surging waters flooded the Dragon King temple (idiom)/fig. to fail to recognize a familiar person/a dispute between close people who fail to recognize each other
pinyin: da4 shui3 chong1 le5 Long2 Wang2 miao4

sentences.english: This holy image of the Dragon King came down to me from Guru Chen.
sentences.chinese: 此龍王聖像乃陳上師留傳下來給我的。

sentences.english: Moved to the East China Sea Dragon King, Dragon King ordered Poseidon to help build a bridge.
sentences.chinese: 感動了東海龍王，龍王命海神幫助造橋。

sentences.english: Moved to the East China Sea Dragon King, Dragon King ordered Poseidon to help build a bridge.
sentences.chinese: 感動了東海龍王，龍王命海神幫助造橋。

sentences.english: Is It The King of Dragon?
sentences.chinese: 你也許會想，“究竟誰是龍王呢？”

sentences.english: Basilosaurus was the first whale to become truly gigantic in size.
sentences.chinese: 龍王鯨是第一個真正的海中巨鯨。

sentences.english: The Sea Dragon King of the East Sea belief is one of three worships of Zhou Shan fishermen.
sentences.chinese: 東海龍王信仰是舟山漁民三大信仰之一。

sentences.english: But no need to insist that both Guru Chen's poem and mine in praise of the Dragon King be included.
sentences.chinese: 不過，不必堅持一定要同時用陳上師及我的贊龍王詩。

sentences.english: "Long Wang Pond" is a farmer park opened up by farmers with their own money.
sentences.chinese: “龍王塘”是農民自己動手籌建的一個農民公園。

sentences.english: Is the Dragon King of the prime minister ah.
sentences.chinese: 烏龜是誰？是海龍王的宰相啊。

sentences.english: The Heaven God claimed that only when the gold beans were in blossom could the Dragon King return to the heaven palace.
sentences.chinese: 玉帝下令，只有當金豆開花之時才允許龍王返回天庭。

sentences.english: There is a Yonggungsa nautical miles, is home to the dragon king and his descendants.
sentences.chinese: 海里有一座龍宮，住着龍王和他的子孫。

sentences.english: The dragon king rules the rivers and protects the villages through the tough winter months.
sentences.chinese: 龍王主宰著河川，並且保護各個村落安然度過寒冬。

sentences.english: Conclusion unprepared, incredibly encountered under four dragon king at the hands of latent.
sentences.chinese: 豈料不備之下，居然遭遇了四龍王手下的潛伏。

sentences.english: Wukong said a spell to call the Dragon King of the Eastern Sea.
sentences.chinese: 這時悟空念起咒來叫喚東海龍王。

sentences.english: Does our bare hand deal with Long Wang?
sentences.chinese: 難道我們赤手空拳去對付龍王？

sentences.english: Any effort in showing the respect is fine.
sentences.chinese: 任何表達對龍王尊敬的努力都是好的。

definition: palace of the Dragon King at the bottom of the Eastern Sea
May you have peace year after year (New Year's greeting)
Mile county in Honghe Hani and Yi autonomous prefecture, Yunnan/Maitreya, the future Bodhisattva, to come after Shakyamuni Buddha
(of a supernatural or divine being) to appear/to make itself manifest
Guanyin, the Bodhisattva of Compassion or Goddess of Mercy (Sanskrit Avalokiteśvara)
to arrive home/facing one's home/home-coming/(soccer) facing the goalmouth
abundant harvest of all food crops/bumper grain harvest
imperial canopy (e.g. domed umbrella-like roof over carriage)/aureole/halo
